summary: This document is a summary of a business checking account statement from Deutsche Bank for the period of May 1, 2017, to May 31, 2017. It details account balances, transactions, and debits, including payroll fees and other charges. The document provides insight into the financial activities associated with the account during this time frame.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is listed as the account holder associated with the Deutsche Bank account detailed in the document.

persons.name: Stewart Oldheld
persons.context: Stewart Oldheld is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $414,687.72 on May 1, 2017.
The ending balance as of May 31, 2017, was $364,919.76.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made during the month, including payroll fees and health insurance premiums.
No service charges or overdraft fees were incurred during this statement period.
The document includes contact information for reporting errors or inquiries related to the account.
